title: PID Controller Function Block
description: This function block implements a PID (Proportional, Integral, Derivative) controller. It calculates a control output based on the input value, proportional gain, integral time, and derivative time while respecting the limits on the integrator output.
name: FT_PID

input.name: IN
input.description: The input value to the PID controller.

input.name: ILIM_L
input.description: Lower limit for the integrator output.

input.name: ILIM_H
input.description: Upper limit for the integrator output.

output.name: Y
output.description: The output value of the PID controller.

output.name: LIM
output.description: Flag indicating whether the integrator has hit its limits.
